rawMetadata: {"compiler":{"version":"0.8.24+commit.e11b9ed9"},"language":"Solidity","output":{"abi":[],"devdoc":{"author":"Euler Labs (https://www.eulerlabs.com/)","custom:security-contact":"security@euler.xyz","details":"The execution context is a bit field that stores the following information:- on behalf of account - an account on behalf of which the currently executed operation is being performed- checks deferred flag - used to indicate whether checks are deferred- checks in progress flag - used to indicate that the account/vault status checks are in progress. This flag is used to prevent re-entrancy.- control collateral in progress flag - used to indicate that the control collateral is in progress. This flag is used to prevent re-entrancy.- operator authenticated flag - used to indicate that the currently executed operation is being performed by the account operator- simulation flag - used to indicate that the currently executed batch call is a simulation- stamp - dummy value for optimization purposes","kind":"dev","methods":{},"title":"ExecutionContext","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{},"notice":"This library provides functions for managing the execution context in the Ethereum Vault
